changelog_text:
**What's New in v1.7.8.3-Beta:**

**Fixed:**
• forum handling for noQuote forward
• forum handling for gif with spoiler
• forum handling for gif with caption
• handle user and forum replies for GIFs with caption
• handle user and forum replies for GIFs with spoiler
• draft panel not hiding after sending message

**Removed:**
• forum checks for GIF spoiler and caption menu items
